snippet.title: Placing pauses in read spoken Spanish : a model and an algorithm
snippet.description: Placing pauses in read spoken Spanish : a model and an algorithm / Marín Gálvez, Rafael (Universitat Autònoma de Barcelona. Departament de Filologia Espanyola) ; Aguilar, Lourdes (Universitat Autònoma de Barcelona. Departament de Filologia Espanyola) ; Casacuberta, David, 1967- (Universitat Autònoma de Barcelona. Departament de Filosofia) The purpose of this work is to describe the appearance and location of typographically unmarked pauses in any Spanish text to be read. An experiment is designed to derive pause location from natural speech: results show that Intonation Group length constraints guide the appearance of pauses, which are placed depending on syntactic information. [...] 2002 Language design : journal of theoretical and experimental linguistics, V. 4 (2002) p. 49-66
